name: Creator
description: Project Eden strives to be a welcoming and supportive environment for creators of all kinds. To help facilitate involvement from the community and support your ambitions as a creator, we have created exclusive badges for content creators. If you produce Project Eden related content on Twitch, YouTube, or any other platform, you can apply to receive your badge and access to the #creators channel on Discord, where you can announce when you go live or release new content.

name: Builder
description: Builders help with any build related needs for the server, such as events, minigame maps, spawns, and warps. They frequently collaborate as a team on large-scale projects. Strong technical skills, such as proficiency in WorldEdit and an in-depth knowledge of Minecraft mechanics, are essential for achieving the highest quality work. Additionally, Builders may assist in designing custom items and blocks for the server using Blockbench.

pages.title: Understanding the Requirements
pages.description: Before continuing, please fully read the Builder rank section on the wiki: https://wiki.projecteden.gg/wiki/Ranks#Builder

pages.title: Availability & Communication
pages.description: Answering no to any of these questions does not automatically disqualify you

questions.label: Do you have Discord?
questions.description: We use hidden Discord text channels to communicate among staff, so being active on Discord is a very important aspect of being a builder. If the answer is no, please explain why not.

questions.label: Do you have a smartphone capable of running Discord, and if so, are you able to keep it on most of the time (so you receive Discord notifications)?
questions.description: We don't need you to dedicate every waking hour to Project Eden, or be on 24/7, but its important that we're able to reach our staff quickly and that messages get seen and responded to in a timely fashion.

questions.label: Is your computer or phone able to run multiple applications (Minecraft, Discord, web browser) at the same time?
questions.description: Don't worry if it isn't - we'd just like to know.

questions.label: Do you have a mic to communicate with on Discord, and are you willing to use it?
questions.description: Using a mic helps us progress tasks/conversations quicker than with text. If no, are you at least able to join voice, listen, and communicate via text?

questions.label: We use GitHub as a project management tool and to-do list. Are you willing to sign up and use the service in order to keep up to date?
questions.description: GitHub is free, and you can also interact with it via a Discord bot. You will receive training for this service during the on-boarding process.

pages.title: Your Portfolio
pages.description: To become a builder, we need to be able to see that you have the skills and the dedication. The Builder rank isn't a trophy, it is considered a staff rank that is an integral part of our team.

questions.label: What makes you different from other applicants? Why should we choose you?
questions.description: Write about what your strengths are, both as a builder and as a team member, what experience you have, etc.

questions.label: What builds have you completed on Project Eden?
questions.description: Please provide a map link and/or command to teleport to each build

questions.label: Anything else you'd like to share?

pages.title: Review & Submit
pages.description: Please review your answers and submit your application below

name: Moderator
description: Moderators serve as the frontline of the server staff, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable experience for all players. Their responsibilities include answering player questions, resolving griefing issues, moderating chat, and addressing general player concerns. Beyond day-to-day support, Moderators actively contribute to the server's growth by collaborating with senior staff to brainstorm ideas and assist in implementing exciting new features that enhance the community experience.
